description: Least prime factor of the n-th composite number.
links: Reinhard Zumkeller, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..10000
prog: (MAGMA) [ PrimeDivisors(n)[1]: n in [2..140] | not IsPrime(n) ]; // _Klaus Brockhaus_, Jun 23 2009(Haskell)a056608 = a020639 . a002808  -- _Reinhard Zumkeller_, Mar 29 2014(PARI) forcomposite(n=1, 1e2, p=factor(n)[1, 1]; print1(p, ", ")) \\ _Felix Fr√∂hlich_, Aug 03 2014
crossrefs: Cf. A052369 (largest prime factor of n, where n runs through composite numbers). [From _Klaus Brockhaus_, Jun 23 2009]
author: _Odimar Fabeny_, Aug 07 2000
extensions: More terms from _James A. Sellers_, Aug 25 2000
